methods.name: AppPackageName
methods.description: Returns the package name of the current running application.

methods.name: ApplicationLastUpdatedTime
methods.description: Returns the last updated time of the application from the given package name.

methods.name: ApplicationName
methods.description: Returns the application name from the given package name, else returns the notFound value.

methods.name: ApplicationSpecificDirectory
methods.description: Returns an absolute path of the application specific directory.

methods.name: BatteryCapacity
methods.description: Returns the battery capacity.

methods.name: BatteryHealth
methods.description: Returns the health value of the phone's battery.

methods.name: BatteryPercentage
methods.description: Returns the battery level in percentage.

methods.name: BatteryPluggedSource
methods.description: Returns the device the phone is plugged to. Can be 'USB', 'AC', 'WIRELESS' or 'UNKNOWN'.

methods.name: BatteryStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the phone's battery.

methods.name: BatteryTechnology
methods.description: Returns the battery technology.

methods.name: BatteryVoltage
methods.description: Returns the current battery voltage.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: Returns the name of the underlying board, like goldfish.

methods.name: Bootloader
methods.description: Returns the system bootloader version number.

methods.name: Brand
methods.description: Returns the consumer-visible brand with which the product/hardware will be associated, if any.

methods.name: CacheDirectory
methods.description: Returns the absolute path of the cache directory of the application.

methods.name: ColorConvertHexToInt
methods.description: Convert a hex color to a integer color. The result is returned as integer. This function does not support shorthand hex values like #000.

methods.name: ColorConvertIntToHex
methods.description: Convert a integer color to a hex color. The result is returned as string.

methods.name: CurrentLatitude
methods.description: Returns the user's current latitude.

methods.name: CurrentLongitude
methods.description: Returns the user's current longitude.

methods.name: DeviceId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the device.

methods.name: DisableBluetooth
methods.description: Turns off Bluetooth without user interaction.

methods.name: Display
methods.description: Returns a build ID string meant for displaying to the user.

methods.name: DisplayCountry
methods.description: Returns a name for the locale's country that is appropriate for display to the user.

methods.name: DisplayFontScale
methods.description: Returns the font scale of the display.

methods.name: DisplayHeight
methods.description: Returns the display height of the device.

methods.name: DisplayLanguage
methods.description: Returns a name for the locale's language that is appropriate for display to the user.

methods.name: DisplayPhysicalSize
methods.description: Returns the physical size of the device.

methods.name: DisplayRefreshRate
methods.description: Returns the refresh rate of the display in frames per second.

methods.name: DisplayRotation
methods.description: Returns the rotation of the screen from its 'natural' orientation. The returned value may be Surface.ROTATION_0 (no rotation), Surface.ROTATION_90, Surface.ROTATION_180, or Surface.ROTATION_270.For example, if a device has a naturally tall screen, and the user has turned it on its side to go into a landscape orientation, the value returned here may be either Surface.ROTATION_90 or Surface.ROTATION_270 depending on the direction it was turned. The angle is the rotation of the drawn graphics on the screen, which is the opposite direction of the physical rotation of the device.

methods.name: DisplayScreenTimeout
methods.description: Returns the screen timeout time of the device.

methods.name: DisplayScript
methods.description: Returns a name for the the locale's script that is appropriate for display to the user.

methods.name: DisplayWidth
methods.description: Returns the display width of the device.

methods.name: EnableBluetooth
methods.description: Turns on Bluetooth without user interaction.

methods.name: ExternalStorageAvailable
methods.description: Returns the available storage size in bytes.

methods.name: ExternalStorageTotal
methods.description: Returns the total amount of external storage in bytes.

methods.name: ExternalStorageUsed
methods.description: Returns the used amount of external storage in bytes.

methods.name: Fingerprint
methods.description: Returns the fingerprint of the device.

methods.name: GetBatteryChargingTime
methods.description: Attempts to calculate the remaining charging time and triggers the GotChargingTime event.

methods.name: GetCity
methods.description: Returns the city name from the given latitude and the longitude.

methods.name: GetCountryName
methods.description: Returns the name of the country from the given latitude and longitude.

methods.name: GetIpAddress
methods.description: Returns the IP address.

methods.name: GetLuminanceOfColor
methods.description: Returns the relative luminance of a color. This block only supports devices above or Android 8.0.

methods.name: GetMacAddress
methods.description: Returns the MAC address(media access control address) of the device.

methods.name: GetNumberOfCores
methods.description: Returns the number of processors available to the Java virtual machine.

methods.name: GetPostalCode
methods.description: Returns the postal code from the latitude and the longitude.

methods.name: GetStreetAddress
methods.description: Returns the street address from the given latitude and the longitude.

methods.name: Hardware
methods.description: Returns the name of the hardware (from the kernel command line or /proc).

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Returns to the home screen of the application. Your application is not closed.

methods.name: Id
methods.description: Returns either a changelist number, or a label like M4-rc20.

methods.name: InstallationFromAppStore
methods.description: Returns the package name of the app that has installled your application.

methods.name: InstalledApplications
methods.description: Returns a list of all installed applications.

methods.name: InternalMemoryAvailable
methods.description: Returns the available internal memory in bytes.

methods.name: InternalMemoryTotal
methods.description: Returns the total internal memory size in bytes.

methods.name: InternalMemoryUsed
methods.description: Returns the used internal memory in bytes.

methods.name: IsAdbDebuggingEnabled
methods.description: Checks if ADB debugging is enabled, which might be a sign of hacking your app.

methods.name: IsAirplaneModeEnabled
methods.description: Checks if the airplane mode of the device is on.

methods.name: IsBatteryPresent
methods.description: Indicating whether a battery is present.

methods.name: IsBluetoothOn
methods.description: Returns true if Bluetooth is on, else false.

methods.name: IsCameraAvailable
methods.description: Returns true if the device's camera is available, else false.

methods.name: IsDarkColor
methods.description: Returns true if the color is dark, else it returns false, means the color is light. The result is returned as boolean.

methods.name: IsDateAndTimeAutomatic
methods.description: Checks if 'Automatic Date and Time' is enabled in Settings.

methods.name: IsEmailAddressVaild
methods.description: Tests if the email address is valid.

methods.name: IsEmulator
methods.description: Checks if the app is operating on an emulator.

methods.name: IsExternalMemoryAvailable
methods.description: Checks if external memory is available.

methods.name: IsFlashAvailable
methods.description: Returns true if the device has a flashlight, else false.

methods.name: IsHdrCapable
methods.description: Returns whether the screen has a high dynamic rate. This only works in versions larger or Android 8.

methods.name: IsInstalledFromPlayStore
methods.description: Tests if the application is installed from Google Play Store.

methods.name: IsNightModeActive
methods.description: Checks if the night mode of the device is on.

methods.name: IsScreenRound
methods.description: Return whether the screen has a round shape. Apps may choose to change styling based on this property, such as the alignment or layout of text or informational icons.This block requires devices with Android 6 or higher.

methods.name: IsScreenWideColorGamut
methods.description: Return whether the screen has a wide color gamut and wide color gamut rendering is supported by this device. When true, it implies the screen is colorspace aware but not necessarily color-managed. The final colors may still be changed by the screen depending on user settings.

methods.name: IsSdCardAvailable
methods.description: Checks whether the SD card is available.

methods.name: IsSmsCapable
methods.description: Returns true if the current device supports SMS service.

methods.name: Iso3Country
methods.description: Returns a three-letter abbreviation for this locale's country. If the country matches an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code, the corresponding ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 uppercase code is returned. If the locale doesn't specify a country, this will be the empty string.

methods.name: Iso3Language
methods.description: Returns a three-letter abbreviation of this locale's language. If the language matches an ISO 639-1 two-letter code, the corresponding ISO 639-2/T three-letter lowercase code is returned. The ISO 639-2 language codes can be found on-line, see 'Codes for the Representation of Names of Languages Part 2: Alpha-3 Code'. If the locale specifies a three-letter language, the language is returned as is. If the locale does not specify a language the empty string is returned.

methods.name: KernelVersion
methods.description: Returns the Kernel version of the device.

methods.name: LanguageTag
methods.description: Returns a well-formed IETF BCP 47 language tag representing this locale.

methods.name: Manufacturer
methods.description: Returns the manufacturer of the product or hardware.

methods.name: MemoryFree
methods.description: Returns the available RAM on the device in bytes.

methods.name: MemoryTotal
methods.description: Returns the total RAM on the device in bytes.

methods.name: MemoryUsed
methods.description: Returns the used RAM on the device in bytes.

methods.name: ModelName
methods.description: Returns the name of the device.

methods.name: NavigationBarHeight
methods.description: Returns the height of the navigation bar of the device.

methods.name: NumberOfCameras
methods.description: Returns the number of cameras available on the device.

methods.name: NumberToString
methods.description: Converts a number to a string.

methods.name: Product
methods.description: Returns the name of the overall product.

methods.name: SensorAmount
methods.description: Returns the total amount of sensors on the device.

methods.name: SensorList
methods.description: Returns a list of all sensors on the device.

methods.name: SetNavigationBarColor
methods.description: Resets the navigation bar color to the given color.

methods.name: SetStatusBarColor
methods.description: Resets the status bar color to the given color.

methods.name: SetStatusBarColorDefault
methods.description: Sets the status bar color to the default or transparent color.

methods.name: SimCountryIso
methods.description: Returns the ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.

methods.name: SimOperator
methods.description: Returns the MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code) of the provider of the SIM. 5 or 6 decimal digits.

methods.name: SimOperatorName
methods.description: Returns the Service Provider Name (SPN).

methods.name: StringToNumber
methods.description: Converts a string to a number.

methods.name: Supported32BitAbis
methods.description: Returns a list of 32 bit ABIs supported by this device. The most preferred ABI is the first element in the list.

methods.name: Supported64BitAbis
methods.description: Returns a list of 64 bit ABIs supported by this device. The most preferred ABI is the first element in the list.

methods.name: SupportedAbis
methods.description: Returns a list of ABIs supported by this device. The most preferred ABI is the first element in the list.

methods.name: Tags
methods.description: Returns comma-separated tags describing the build, like 'unsigned,debug'.

methods.name: TextToHexadecimal
methods.description: Turns a string value into a hexadecimal value.

methods.name: Time
methods.description: The time at which the build was produced, given in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch.

methods.name: Type
methods.description: Returns the type of build, like 'user' or 'eng'.

methods.name: VersionCodeFrom
methods.description: Returns the version code from the package name.

methods.name: VersionNameFrom
methods.description: Returns the version name of an app from the package name.

blockProperties.name: AndroidVersion
blockProperties.description: Returns the Android version of the phone.

blockProperties.name: BaseOS
blockProperties.description: Returns the base OS build the product is based on.

blockProperties.name: BatteryCharging
blockProperties.description: Returns true if the device is charging, else false.

blockProperties.name: CpuTemperature
blockProperties.description: Returns the CPU temperature of the device.

blockProperties.name: Incremental
blockProperties.description: Returns the internal value used by the underlying source control to represent this build.

blockProperties.name: IsLocationServiceEnabled
blockProperties.description: Returns true if the location services are enabled, else false.

blockProperties.name: Release
blockProperties.description: Returns the user-visible version string. E.g., '1.0' or '3.4b5' or 'bananas'. This field is an opaque string. Do not assume that its value has any particular structure or that values of RELEASE from different releases can be somehow ordered.

blockProperties.name: SdkCodeName
blockProperties.description: Returns the current development codename, or the string 'REL' if this is a release build.

blockProperties.name: SdkVersion
blockProperties.description: Returns the SDK version of the software currently running on this hardware device.

blockProperties.name: SecurityPatch
blockProperties.description: Returns the user-visible security patch level. This value represents the date when the device most recently applied a security patch.

name: Device
helpString: A non-visible extension that gets some information or parse data of the user's device.

events.name: GotChargingTime
events.description: Triggered when finished calculating the remaining charging time. Returns -1 when an error is occured.
